name: gnome-download-notify
title: Gnome Download Notifications
description: Gnome notification integration for downloads. Requires notify-send
author: ion201

preferences.name: use_custom_icon
preferences.title: Use custom icon
preferences.description: If checked, use the icon specified below rather than the default

preferences.name: icon_path
preferences.title: Icon path
preferences.description: Path to icon to use in notification.

preferences.name: enforce_transient
preferences.title: Only transient notifications
preferences.description: All notifications will be transient. Ignores the next option

preferences.name: transient_before_time
preferences.title: Transient notifications timing
preferences.description: Use transient notifications for downloads faster than this time (in ms). Set to 0 to disable transient notifications

preferences.name: notify_timeout
preferences.title: Notification timeout
preferences.description: Notification timeout (in ms). Will work when notify-send devs actually implement this option
